an8.61:2.1: 7. Bhūmicālavagga
an8.61:4.1: * “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an8.61:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:4.5: Tassa uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.61:4.6: So tena alābhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an8.61:4.8: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, socī ca paridevī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’. (1)
an8.61:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:5.3: Tassa uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.61:5.4: So tena lābhena majjati pamajjati pamādamāpajjati.
an8.61:5.6: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca madī ca pamādī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’. (2)
an8.61:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:6.2: So na uṭṭhahati na ghaṭati na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.61:6.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato aghaṭato avāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.61:6.4: So tena alābhena socati, kilamati, paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an8.61:6.6: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati na ghaṭati na vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, socī ca paridevī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’. (3)
an8.61:7.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:7.2: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.61:7.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.61:7.4: So tena lābhena majjati, pamajjati, pamādamāpajjati.
an8.61:7.6: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati na ghaṭati na vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca madī ca, pamādī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’. (4)
an8.61:8.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:8.3: Tassa uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.61:8.4: So tena alābhena na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṃ kandati, na sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an8.61:8.6: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, na ca socī na ca paridevī, accuto ca saddhammā’. (5)
an8.61:9.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:9.3: Tassa uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.61:9.4: So tena lābhena na majjati, na pamajjati, na pamādamāpajjati.
an8.61:9.6: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca, na ca madī na ca pamādī, accuto ca saddhammā’. (6)
an8.61:10.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:10.2: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.61:10.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.61:10.4: So tena alābhena na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattāḷiṃ kandati, na sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an8.61:10.6: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, na ca socī na ca paridevī, accuto ca saddhammā’. (7)
an8.61:11.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.61:11.2: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.61:11.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato aghaṭato avāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.61:11.4: So tena lābhena na majjati, na pamajjati, na pamādamāpajjati.
an8.61:11.6: ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca, na ca madī na ca pamādī, accuto ca saddhammā’. (8)
an8.61:12.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
